recipe.title: Chipotle Mayonnaise with Lime
ingredients: 4 teaspoons minced seeded canned chipotle chiles in adobo, including sauce
instructions: Stir together chipotles and mayonnaise. Squeeze lime juice onto cooked corn, then spread chipotle mayonnaise onto corn.
Stir together chipotles and mayonnaise. Squeeze lime juice onto cooked corn, then spread chipotle mayonnaise onto corn.
